channel.title: ::givemaster command PI
channel.description: I would love it if someone could make or give me a ::Givemaster command. What this will do is give a player all 99s. I would really appreciate it, thanks.

item.title: ::givemaster command PI
item.dc:creator: @djzone djzone
item.description:
@djzone wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemaster") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("encrypted") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("rawr") || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("loaded"))) { String otherPName = playerCommand.substring(11); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); Client p = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; for (int j = 0; j < 6; j++) { p.playerXP[j] = p.getPA().getXPForLevel(99)+5; p.playerLevel[j] = p.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[j]); p.getPA().refreshSkill(j); c.sendMessage("Username: ("+p.playerName+") is now mastered.");
Was a quick searchâ€¦ i dont mind a thanks tho.

Read full topic
